title: No Venture Capital? No Worries—Another Alternative Finance Startup Raises Cash As Novel Lands $115M - Crunchbase News
content: No Venture Capital? No Worries—Another Alternative Finance Startup Raises Cash As Novel Lands $115M  Crunchbase News
description: Kansas City-based Novel Capital announced $115 million in initial equity and debt funding—the latest move in the growing realm of companies looking to offer founders alternatives to traditional venture capital.
